Congregation Brit Shalom will host a memorial service to commemorate the 85th anniversary of Kristallnacht, the fifth anniversary of the Tree of Life shootings, and the topic of anti-semitism more broadly on Sunday, November 12, 2023 at Congregation Brit Shalom, 620 E. Hamilton Avenue, State College, PA 16801.
All are welcome.
